product_name: Gear Aid Whistle Sternum Strap Buckle Kit - 3/4"
long_description: Add this handy safety whistle to your backpack. Before you set out on your next adventure, grab the Whistle Sternum Strap Buckle kit by Gear Aid. Includes a 3/4 in. sternum strap buckle with built-in safety whistle, quick attach tri-glide and detailed instructions for installation. Stabilize your load and add a safety whistle with this sew-free, sternum strap buckle replacement kit.
short_description: Add this handy safety whistle to your backpack. Before you set out on your next adventure, grab the Whistle Sternum Strap Buckle kit by Gear Aid.
